problem_text_en: In parallelogram ABCD, AE:EB = N_0:N_1, S~△AEF~ = N_2, then S~△CDF~ = ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AE:EB=1:2,∴AE:AB=1:3,∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=CD,AB∥CD,∴△AEF∽△CDF,∴\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupAEF}}{S_{\bigtriangleupCDF}}=(\frac{AE}{CD})²=(\frac{AE}{AB})²=\frac{1}{9},∴S~△CDF~=54．故选:D．
raw_comment: 此题考查了相似三角形的判定与性质、平行四边形的性质等知识,熟练掌握相似三角形面积比等于相似比的平方是解题关键．
